plot:
Little Voice, Big Mountain is a film of two parallel running narratives.
 On the one hand it is a heart-warming and exciting story about the 
lives of five underprivileged school children during the build up to 
Nepal's first ever National Youth Debating Championships. On the other 
it is a film about what its like to be a teenager growing up in a 
developing country knowing full well there are options available to you 
other than working in rice fields but that it is almost impossible to 
really realize such dreams. The end result is an uplifting and touching 
ray of light from a country most people know very little about aside 
from its big mountains.
title: Little Voice, Big Mountain
